Introduction
This topic contains information on how multiple marriages to a Veteran may affect a surviving spouse’s ability to meet the marriage requirements that are a factor in determining eligibility to survivors benefits, including
effect of more than one marriage to a Veteran
, and
example of multiple marriages
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Establishing Marital Relationship in Survivors Cases
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
